summary: Small file to help you manage your profiles if you share your PC with somebody else, or if you have multiple characters!
descriptionHtml:
You don\'t need to dig through your sibling\'s save files to find your own no more, or dig through multiple character saves to find the one you feel like playing this day!

This program is designed to peek into your Saves folder, and take it apart into multiple subfolders, as many as there are characters created and named in the game.

You can then use the program to simply choose your own character to play with, simply using Continue game normally and not worrying about losing your Quick saves and Auto saves when changing the characters!

With new verson, you can even create and delete profiles right out of the manager itself!

**********************************
NEW V2.0

V2.0 Full release 

-Added a control to create new profile. 
How to use:
When clicking add new profile, you will be asked to enter
a name for your profile. This can be, but doesn\'t have to,
be the same as the name you will eventually enter into
the actual character creation screen at the start of the game
in Helgen, but it would be nice if it\'s the same, simply
for simplicity sake.

You can choose to import one save file from any other profile 
into this new created profile. 
Thank you \"thefinn\" from Skyrim Nexus for the suggestion!

This is so you can import one Prisoner save file which is saved 
before actual character creation screen so you don\'t have to
sit through the cart ride again. Or, you can import
a save which is already a named character - there is no
name restriction for importing a save. 

-Added a control to remove an existing profile

How to use:
You can only use this to remove a profile which is not
already an active one, please first set another profile as active
before removing the desired one. The profile\'s folder and it\'s 
entry in dat.ASS file will be removed, but the save files will
be saved in a backup folder for you. 

-EXE launcher works properly now:
You can select TESV.exe to run, finally. 


************************************************+
old:

In v1.1 BETA, added an EXE launcher. 
Launcher so far will not with with TESV.exe - use SkyrimLauncher.exe instead. 

See Readme file.

**********************************

Additional information:

What this tool does, is take apart your original Save folder into several folders and splits the save files between them, in relation to character names in the save files. You will be prompted to select the user which played the last, so the program knows where do the last quicksaves and autosaves belong. Setting a profile afterwards renames the folders so the game always uses the correct folder for loading games. You simply \"set\" a profile and you can close the tool and run your game. 

Readme file is contained in the archive and contains complete instructions for using the tool.

All suggestions and feedback is welcome, as well as ideas of what to add/remove/change. 

Thanks!
author: Eudaimonium
